ygData.subject: Re: Best looking clerics?....
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh come on, go for the female gnome cleric.  You will most likely be the only one on your server.  I have only ever seen one gnome cleric. Also, why not choose
ygData.messageBody:
Oh come on, go for the female gnome cleric. You will most likely be
the only one on your server. I have only ever seen one gnome cleric.
Also, why not choose a Halfling cleric? we rock :) I only know one
other L50 Halfling cleric on my server where humans,high elves and
de's are a dime a dozen.

I wouldn't worry about what you look like in plate to much as most of
the time you will either look like a misfit or a druid. I came so
close to making a macro shouting "I am NOT a druid". I was getting so
many sow requests it was driving me nuts. I personally feel that
steel plate is a waste of money for a cleric and it takes a very very
long time to get that purple stuff (as it's commonly referred to).

Drogo DarkBane
L50 Halfling Cleric
The Rathe
